definition: the Japanese side or party (in negotiations etc)
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter
the future is long (idiom); there will be ample time for that later/We'll cross that bridge when we get there

sentences.english: That's a long way off but it's not too early to make plans.
sentences.chinese: 儘管來日方長，但是及早打算總沒錯。

sentences.english: He also said that if a similar incident occurs in the future, Japan will resolutely deal with it.
sentences.chinese: 今後如再次出現類似情況，日方將繼續毅然應對。

sentences.english: The court ordered the Japanese side to pay compensation in this case.
sentences.chinese: 在這個案件中，法庭判令日方賠償。

sentences.english: One of the ships turned its gun turret on a Japanesereconnaissance plane.
sentences.chinese: 其中一艘艦隻將炮管瞄向日方偵察機。

sentences.english: Tensions had escalated since Japan detained the Chinese captain.
sentences.chinese: 日方扣留中方船長是雙方緊張局勢升級。

sentences.english: Japan should immediately let the Chinese captain return unconditionally.
sentences.chinese: 日方應立即無條件放回中方船長。

sentences.english: So Japan had invited Ggong to have his fans meeting there.
sentences.chinese: 所以日方邀請孔劉來日本舉行影迷見面會。

sentences.english: China refused to be mollified, insisting it was owed an apology and compensation.
sentences.chinese: 中國拒絕善罷甘休，堅持要日方道歉和賠償。

sentences.english: There's still time, the sun just single phosphor.
sentences.chinese: 來日方長，太陽只是顆啓明星。

sentences.english: It is reported that Japan Jinxing Huan will focus on nuclear and other issues.
sentences.chinese: 據悉，金星煥將與日方重點討論朝核等問題。

sentences.english: Happiness comes to those who truly deserve it…
sentences.chinese: 的確，真正的幸福，來日方長。

sentences.english: provoked the situation and doubled its mistakes, causing further escalation.
sentences.chinese: 日方挑起事端，又錯上加錯，導致事態進一步升級。

sentences.english: It is hoped that the Japanese side do more to contribute to China-Japan political and security mutual trust.
sentences.chinese: 希望日方多做有利於增進中日政治安全互信的事情。

sentences.english: Youth is short if not, who wanted to come to Japan long.
sentences.chinese: 若非青春苦短，誰會想來日方長。

sentences.english: Japan should understand the situation clearly and let the captain return immediately.
sentences.chinese: 日方要認清形勢，立即放人。

sentences.english: China has already made clarification to Japan.
sentences.chinese: 中方已就此向日方做出澄清。

definition: foreign ministry (e.g. of Japan or Korea)
the Chinese side (in an international venture)
Abe Shinzo (1954-), Japanese LDP politician, prime minister 2006-2007 and from 2012
